items.sentence: Why did you agree to meet Tom the night he was murdered?
Tom did his best to catch up with the rest of the class.
Tom got to the airport with only a few minutes to spare.
Tom could have told Mary the truth, but he chose not to.
Tom could see that Mary was about to break down and cry.
Tom looked for his first-aid kit, but couldn\'t find it.
Tom knew that he was the only one that Mary would trust.
Tom took a beer out of the fridge and handed it to Mary.
I ordered way too much. I don\'t think I can eat it all.
I think Tom shares too much personal information online.
